description:
Capline is reading Tale of the Bamboo Cutter: Princess Kaguya, and soon her envy of Princess Kaguya`s popularity and beauty carry her into a fantasy in which she is the legendary Princess Kajiri, born from a shining butt-bamboo shoot. Capline, as Princess Kajiri, is approached by B.B.B., Gabriel, and Fatton for her hand in marriage, so she sends them on impossible quests. But as her popularity grows, so does her ego... What is the fate of Princess Kajiri?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 憧れ!? カプリーヌのかぐや姫
